headline: Show HN: Monocle – bidirectional code generation library
description: I just published a bidirectional code generation library. Afaik it's the first of its kind, and it opens up a lot of possibilities for cool new types of dev tools. The PoC is for ruby, but the concept is very portable. https://blog.luitjes.it/posts/monocle-bidirectional-code-generation/
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Monocle - 双向的代码生成库
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Monocle - 雙向的代碼生成庫
description_zh-Hans: 我刚刚发布了一个双向的代码生成库。我想这是第一个这样的库，它为新型的开发工具提供了很多可能性。PoC是针对ruby的，但这个概念是非常可移植的。https://blog.luitjes.it/posts/monocle-bidirectional-code-generation/
description_zh-Hant: 我剛剛發佈了一個雙向的代碼生成庫。我想這是第一個這樣的庫，它為新型的開發工具提供了很多可能性。PoC是針對ruby的，但這個概念是非常可移植的。https://blog.luitjes.it/posts/monocle-bidirectional-code-generation/
